It defines elements such as headings, paragraphs, links, images, and lists. - **Syntax:** HTML uses tags enclosed in angle brackets (`< >`). Most tags have an opening tag (``) and a closing tag (``). - **Example:** ```html My Web Page

It controls the design aspects such as colors, fonts, spacing, and positioning. - **Syntax:** CSS uses selectors followed by declarations enclosed in curly braces `{}`.
